amendment.description: Amendment precludes an executive agency from requiring an entity submitting an offer for a Federal contract to disclose political contributions as a condition of participation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 27 printed in House Report 112-88 to preclude an executive agency from requiring an entity submitting an offer for a Federal contract to disclose political contributions as a condition of participation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cole amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 261 - 163 (Roll no. 347).
